pages.title: Turn a New Leaf
pages.text: The first thing you'll need from these new dimensions is simply just some of the long grass there. The unchanging light in the $(thing)Everbright$() and $(thing)Everdawn$() means these grow with rather unique properties. Mix it with materials from the $(thing)Aether$() to make $(item)Brilliant Fibre$(), then use it on some leaves to transform them and harvest the resulting $(item)Gold Leaf$().

pages.heading: Transforming Leaves
pages.description: Slowly transforms over time. Once fully transformed, you can see particles indicating the leaves are ready to be harvested.
